trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_000<tab>Well, a well-wishing welcome to you, adventurer friend! You've worked your way to Fisherman's Bottom.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_001<tab>When you want fish for just a day, you can call a culinarian, but we fishermen feast for life!
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_002<tab>I've set the bait. Think you're ready to bite?
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_Q1_000_1<tab>Do you wish to join the Fishermen's Guild?
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_003<tab>Oh? Here I hastily hoped to hook you in, but I suppose I'll find other fish in the sea.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_004<tab>Feel free to swim back if ever fish fit your fancy!
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_005<tab>Oops! I hooked you only to find a snag─it appears you're on course for a different dock.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_006<tab>I really hate to release such a considerable catch, but here's to hoping you swim back once you've grown into your gills!
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>Before you can take up another discipline, you must first complete the level 10 quest of your starting class.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_010<tab>Hooray, hooray! Looks like we've got a live one! Let me walk you through the life of a fisherman in Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_011<tab>Since we're surrounded by the seas, the fishing sites are a fisherman's delight. If you can't fish it here, you can't fish it anywhere!
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_012<tab>While some of us rope our fish in with rods and reels, others skim the seabed with nets for creepy-crawly critters.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_013<tab>You might say we cast a wide net─people prattle about our pullers just about everywhere in Limsa.

TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_014<tab>And there's much and more I haven't mentioned. We shepherd the ships, preside over the ports, manage the mongers, all while making sure not to leave any adventurers out to sea.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_015<tab>I'll wager you prefer to work alone, so we'll start you off with the rod and reel.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_016<tab>Now, you may not necessarily net the numbers net-fishing yields, but pole-fishing positively pulls prettier prizes.
TEXT_CLSFSH001_01134_NNMULIKA_000_017<tab>And that's the long and short of it! When you're ready for another bite of bait, I'll reel you in before the guildmaster!
